pkgmetadata.longdescription: Total Survey Error (Independent Samples) // Calculates total survey error (TSE) for one or more surveys, using both scale- dependent and scale-independent metrics. Package works directly from the data set, with no hand calculations required: just upload a properly structured data set (see TESTIND and its documentation), properly input column names (see functions documentation), and run your functions. For more on TSE, see: Weisberg, Herbert (2005, ISBN:0-226-89128-3); Biemer, Paul (2010) doi:10.1093/poq/nfq058; Biemer, Paul et.al. (2017, ISBN:9781119041672); etc.
